about-us-page.metaDescription: Discover our story, mission, and vision. Leading provider of premium indoor and outdoor lighting solutions for residential and commercial spaces.
about-us-page.heroSubtitle: For over a decade, we have been at the forefront of lighting innovation, transforming spaces with our carefully curated collection of premium lighting solutions. Our passion for quality and design excellence drives everything we do.
about-us-page.featuresSubtitle: We combine expertise, quality, and innovation to deliver exceptional lighting experiences.

features.title: Expert Lighting Design
features.description: Our certified lighting specialists provide professional calculations based on international lux standards, ensuring optimal illumination for every space. From residential to commercial projects, we deliver customized lighting solutions.

features.title: Premium Quality Products
features.description: We source only the finest lighting fixtures from world-renowned manufacturers. Each product undergoes rigorous quality control to ensure exceptional performance, durability, and aesthetic excellence that stands the test of time.

features.title: Fast Delivery Service
features.description: Experience efficient delivery within 5-7 business days with real-time tracking across all regions. Our logistics partners ensure your lighting fixtures arrive safely and on schedule, ready for installation.

features.title: Extended Warranty Coverage
features.description: All our premium lighting products come with comprehensive 3-5 year warranty coverage. We stand behind the quality of our products and provide responsive support throughout the warranty period.

features.title: Flexible Payment Options
features.description: Shop with confidence using our flexible payment methods including secure cash on delivery, bank transfers, Your convenience and security are our priority.

features.title: Energy Efficiency
features.description: Our LED lighting solutions deliver exceptional energy savings of up to 80% compared to traditional lighting. Reduce your carbon footprint while enjoying superior illumination quality and lower electricity costs.

about-us-page.categoriesSubtitle: Explore our comprehensive range of indoor and outdoor lighting solutions.

categories.title: Indoor Lighting
categories.description: Transform your interior spaces with our exquisite collection of chandeliers, pendant lights, wall sconces, recessed lighting, and decorative fixtures. Perfect for residential, hospitality, and commercial environments.

categories.title: Outdoor Lighting
categories.description: Illuminate your exterior spaces with our weather-resistant outdoor lighting solutions. From garden path lights to architectural facade lighting, create stunning nighttime ambiance and enhanced security.

about-us-page.visionDescription: To be the leading provider of innovative lighting solutions in the region, setting new standards for quality, design excellence, and customer satisfaction. We envision a future where every space is transformed through the artistry of light, creating environments that inspire, comfort, and elevate the human experience.
about-us-page.missionDescription: To deliver exceptional lighting solutions that combine cutting-edge technology, timeless design, and sustainable practices. We are committed to understanding our clients' unique needs and exceeding their expectations through personalized service, expert guidance, and premium products that enhance both functionality and aesthetics.
about-us-page.ctaDescription: Discover our complete collection of premium lighting solutions and let our experts help you create the perfect ambiance for your project.

privacy-page.metaDescription: Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. Our commitment to your privacy and data security.
privacy-page.heroSubtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you visit our website or use our services.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect various types of information to provide and improve our services to you:
items: Personal identification information (name, email address, phone number, shipping address)
Browsing behavior and website usage data through cookies and analytics
Communication preferences and correspondence with our customer service team

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.content: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
items: Processing and fulfilling your orders, including shipping and delivery
Providing customer support and responding to your inquiries
Sending important updates about your orders and our services
Improving our website functionality and user experience
Analyzing trends and preferences to enhance our product offerings
Sending promotional materials and newsletters (with your consent)

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience:
items: Essential cookies for website functionality and security
Analytics cookies to understand how visitors interact with our website
Marketing cookies for personalized advertising (with your consent)
Preference cookies to remember your settings and choices

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information:
items: SSL encryption for all data transmission between your browser and our servers
Regular security audits and vulnerability assessments
Restricted access to personal data on a need-to-know basis
Regular backups and disaster recovery procedures

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.content: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:
items: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete personal information
Withdraw consent for marketing communications at any time

dataSharing.title: Information Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your data with:
items: Shipping and logistics partners to fulfill your orders
Payment processors to handle secure transactions
Analytics and marketing service providers (with anonymized data)
Legal authorities when required by law or to protect our rights
Business partners for joint marketing initiatives (with your explicit consent)

childrenPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Our services are not directed to individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately so we can delete such information.

policyChanges.title: Changes to This Policy
policyChanges.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the updated policy on our website and updating the 'Last Updated' date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this privacy policy or how we handle your personal information, please contact us:

header.title: Product Categories
header.subtitle: Discover our curated collections of premium lighting solutions, meticulously designed for both interior and exterior applications.

indoor.title: Indoor Lighting
indoor.subtitle: Interior Collection
indoor.description: Sophisticated lighting solutions designed to enhance every interior space. From ambient ceiling fixtures to accent wall lights, our indoor collection combines aesthetic excellence with functional illumination.

outdoor.title: Outdoor Lighting
outdoor.subtitle: Exterior Collection
outdoor.description: Weather-resistant lighting engineered for outdoor environments. Illuminate gardens, pathways, and architectural features with fixtures built to withstand the elements while delivering exceptional performance.

features.consultationDescription: Professional lighting design assistance to help you select the perfect fixtures for your project.
features.technicalDescription: Comprehensive installation guides and technical specifications for all products.
features.qualityDescription: All fixtures undergo rigorous testing to meet international lighting standards.

features-section.footerCta: All products backed by quality assurance and customer satisfaction guarantee

features.title: Lighting Study
features.description: Professional lighting calculations based on international lux standards.

features.title: Premium Quality Products
features.description: Top-tier lighting fixtures engineered for durability and long-term performance.

features.title: Fast Delivery
features.description: 5-7 days delivery with real-time tracking across all regions.

features.title: Extended Warranty
features.description: 3-5 years comprehensive warranty on all premium lighting products.

features.title: Cash on Delivery
features.description: Flexible payment options including secure cash on delivery.
